name: Remove tabs and fields from WooCommerce
author: Puvox.software

sections.description:
[ âœ… ğ’ğ„ğ‚ğ”ğ‘ğ„ ğğ‹ğ”ğ†ğˆğğ’ bğ“ ğ’«ğ“Šğ“‹ğ‘œğ“ ] :

â€¢ Revised for security to be reliable and free of vulnerability holes.
â€¢ Efficient, not to add any extra load/slowness to site.
â€¢ Don’t collect private data.

Plugin Description

Remove extra tabs and fields from WooCommerce items & checkout. You should enter WooCommerce > Settings > RTF tab to maange the plugin.

You can remove the following tabs:

  • General
  • Inventory
  • Shipping
  • Linked Products
  • Attributes
  • Variations
  • Advanced

or sub-fields from those tabs

  • Sku
  • Weight
  • Dimensions
  • Tax

also Product Types:

  • Simple product
  • Grouped product
  • External/Affiliate product
  • Variable product

and fields (from product or checkout page):

  • Additional_information
  • Billing Descirption

  • Reviews

  • Billing first name

  • Billing last name
  • Billing address1
  • Billing address2
  • Billing city
  • Billing postcode
  • Billing country
  • Billing state
  • Billing phone

  • Billing email

  • Shipping first name

  • Shipping last name
  • Shipping company
  • Shipping address1
  • Shipping address2
  • Shipping city
  • Shipping postcode
  • Shipping country

  • Shipping state

  • Order Comments

Available Options

See all available options and their description on plugin’s settings page.
sections.installation:
A) Enter your website “Admin Dashboard > Plugins > Add New” and enter the plugin name
or
B) Download plugin from WordPress.org , Extract the zip file and upload the container folder to “wp-content/plugins/”
sections.faq: • More at our WP plugins page.
